author: wizardj007
title: Good location for shopping and close to the theatre district - Review
text:
Good location for visiting the biggest store in the world , Macy's, The rooms are decent size around 30 floors in total, if you get front facing rooms you will get a view of the Empire State Building. The only disappointing thing is that they don't do room service but have a small snack shop you can buy basics if you arrive late at night. They have a good breakfast room on lobby level with hot / cold stations and eggs made to order. Good selection of cereals , fruit, yogurt, pastry or hot cooked breakfast if desired.
Room Tip: High floor front facing is best See more room tips
